Hi

I believe there iss a full list in this book.













Allyn,
J. (1970). The 47 Ronin story. North Clarendon,
Vermont: Tuttle Publishing: An Imprint of Periplus Editions (HK) Ltd.




Its 'faction', in that he took the known facts and added fiction in the form of dialogue to make a novel but i think he has a list in the back, i don't have it with me to check though.

Cheers R

To: samuraihistory@yahoogroups.com
From: kenhankerson@...
Date: Tue, 18 Aug 2009 14:28:20 -0700
Subject: [samuraihistory] 47 ronin















 




    
                  Does anyone know where I can find a complete listing of the 47 ronin?  I found a listing of 33 of the names in an article "Swords of the 47 Ronin" by Albert Yamanaka.



kh
